oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil-War era Photograph of locomotive, train cars and men
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows Civil War-era locomotive and cars with engineer and brakeman and assembled men on platform. Written on back: "Bremen about 1865." and "Uncle Corry." The clothing worn by most of the men in the image suggests that this may be slightly after the Civil War and date to the 1870s.
